page.title: 12Great Corby
page.content: In Great Corby we met a most interesting lady who had lived in the village for 66 years,she was 93 years old. She has lived 47 years in the same house which was built about 1800 A.D. Once she lived in the Toll Box,a cottage at the end of the viaduct. She has seen great changes in so many things since she was young. After the general strike of 1926 A.D.most people were poor but they formed choirs,drama groups,a tennis club and the W.I. had just started.She, like many other young women was very good at knitting,sewing and crochet work. Most people now, she thought,did little with their spare time except watch television.Not enough young people have hobbies or interests and many have no work to go to.
